attributes.action: Make Noddy Holder a " Sir" for his services to Christmas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nod the God has sung loud and clear for the last 34 years. His " It's Christmas!!!" chant has cheered many people up over that period of time and he has become a legend. He does lots for charity and has stuck firmly to his roots. A great man, a true gentleman and a rock legend. Keep on Rockin!!!
